Html:
From :  Don Burnett Expression MVP 2008-2009

I  am hosting an MVP live meeting chat to have a roundtable chat/discussion about designing and developing LoB Applications using Blend and Visual Studio 2008 and the steps, hurdles and pitfalls you have to watch.. Everyone is invited to participate.. Note even though their is phone dial-in that doesn't work everywhere, it's best to use your computer audio. We hope to walk through some best practices and include everyone's suggestions an ideas for successful design and development interaction..

-Don Burnett


Meeting Details 
 
  
 
Subject:  Roundtable Discussion of Using Composite Application Guidance with Expression Blend 2
 
 
Start Time:  Tuesday, Jun 30, 2009 7:30 PM EDT
 
 
End Time:  Tuesday, Jun 30, 2009 8:30 PM EDT
 
 
Occurrence:  One time meeting
